// Generated by tailwind-generator, be careful when editing this file

type tailwind
  = Tailwind(string)

let tailwind = classes =>
  classes
  ->Belt.List.map((Tailwind(c)) => c)
  ->Belt.List.toArray
  ->Js.Array2.joinWith(" ")

let tailwindOpt = classes =>
  classes->Js.List.filterMap((. x) => x, _)->tailwind

{% for class in classes %}
let {{class|name}} = Tailwind("{{class}}")
{% endfor %}
